name: Overdue books
query:
--  SELECT 
--     name AS "Loan ID:Link/Loan",
--     member AS "Member:Link/Member",
--     book AS "Book:Link/Book",
--     due_date AS "Due Date:Date",
--     DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), due_date) AS "Days Overdue:Int"
-- FROM `tabLoan`
-- WHERE docstatus = 1
-- AND type = 'Borrow'
-- AND due_date < CURDATE()
-- ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT 
    `tabLoan`.name AS "Loan ID:Link/Loan",
    `tabLoan`.member AS "Member:Link/Member",
    `tabMember`.full_name AS "Member Name:Data",
    `tabLoan`.book AS "Book:Link/Book",
    `tabBook`.title AS "Book Title:Data",
    `tabLoan`.due_date AS "Due Date:Date",
    DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), `tabLoan`.due_date) AS "Days Overdue:Int"
FROM `tabLoan`
LEFT JOIN `tabMember` ON `tabLoan`.member = `tabMember`.name
LEFT JOIN `tabBook` ON `tabLoan`.book = `tabBook`.name
WHERE `tabLoan`.docstatus = 1
AND `tabLoan`.type = 'Borrow'
AND `tabLoan`.due_date < CURDATE()
ORDER BY `tabLoan`.due_date ASC;
